name: Ext_R5_MedicationRequest_status
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.MedicationRequest.status for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicationRequest.status from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicationRequest|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: active | on-hold | ended | stopped | completed | cancelled | entered-in-error | draft | unknown
element.definition: A code specifying the current state of the order.  Generally, this will be active or completed state.
element.comment: `MedicationRequest.status` maps to R4 `MedicationRequest.status`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
element.isModifierReason: This element is labeled as a modifier because it is a status element that contains status entered-in-error which means that the resource should not be treated as valid

element.short: active | on-hold | ended | stopped | completed | cancelled | entered-in-error | draft | unknown
element.definition: A code specifying the current state of the order.  Generally, this will be active or completed state.
element.comment: `MedicationRequest.status` maps to R4 `MedicationRequest.status`. So is mapped as Equivalent.

binding.description: A coded concept specifying the state of the prescribing event. Describes the lifecycle of the prescription.
